body: I don't see the issue...he isn't in a steady relationship with any of these girls. he's just been fucking them. Yes he lied whenever any of them asked if he's sleeping around BUT he isn't technically cheating. plus 2 of these women (maybe more but 2 confirmed) are married and cheating on their husbands with him...so, aren't THEY trash? I mean geez, talk about putting all the blame and responsibility on the guy =/
